Reviews.Title: Vivitar 9112
Reviews.Author: J. Lindner
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera this past weekend.  I was going to an event where my DSL camera would be awkward and I wanted something I could slide in my pocket.  I bought this since it offered good picture resolution, 9.1 megapixels, yet was under $50.  This camera got the job done for me.  I liked the crisp pictures and since there was a large crowd, I was able to hold the camera up over my head and point and shoot.  None of my pictures will ever grace Time or National Geographic magazines, but I was able to capture memories and isn't that why we buy cameras in the first place?If you want an inexpensive yet powerful little camera, I suggest you consider the Vivitar 9112.  There are other cameras out there, but you'll likely be as pleased as I was when I viewed my photos after my weekend event.  Beware, this camera, like others in its class, goes through batteries pretty fast.  Buy an econopac of AAA batteries before you hit the road.  But you will end up with a fine collection of photos for your efforts.

Reviews.Title: loved it
Reviews.Author: shelly
Reviews.Content: I made very good use of this product. i even sent it to relatives abroad to let them see how good it is. i will soon purchase another.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera.
Reviews.Author: Satisfied User
Reviews.Content: My six year old grandson wanted a camera for Christmas.  I chose this camera because I thought it would be better than a child's camera for about the same price.

Reviews.Title: vivitar 9112
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: this camera takes really crummy pictures and the video has no audio.The zoom makes the pictures look terrible. It is not rechargeable so your are always looking for batteries. The only good part about this camera is it is durable and works OK in the cold.

Reviews.Title: love the convenience
Reviews.Author: Geoff Ward
Reviews.Content: Very convenient, easy to use, fits into almost any pocket. Great little camera for everyday use.  Picture results are good.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Gramma Tammie
Reviews.Content: easy to use, easy enough for a 7 yr old to use,  takes GREAT pictures, nice zoom also. I would recommend  this to others

Reviews.Title: Christmas Present
Reviews.Author: Lena Moyer
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for my daughter for Christmas.  She took pictures with it a couple times.  Went to turn it on and it wouldn't turn on.  I tried to return it and didn't receive an answer on how to return it.  I'm so disappointed with this product.  I don't know if they are all junk or if I just bought a lemon but I do that I had one disappointed daughter!

Reviews.Title: Blurry pictures every time.
Reviews.Author: Kid of God
Reviews.Content: It's a cheap camera.  I do not recommend it.  I take pictures daily - my husband bought this for me when I was in a pinch, I ended up buying a new camera in less than a week.  EVERY picture was blurry - it's not just a matter of user error.  I might let my 5 year old use it for play, but not for any kind of real memory making.

Reviews.Title: unhappy with camera.
Reviews.Author: wenda lou
Reviews.Content: Was not  what expected from description.  Returned item already.  Was wanting digital NOT having to use computer for developing photos with the big enough view to see.

Reviews.Title: Junk
Reviews.Author: Zachary Halfmann
Reviews.Content: This product is junk.  It did not work upon arrival.  Don't waste your time purchasing this product. Listen to the reviews.

Reviews.Title: Vivitar Digital 9.1 Camera
Reviews.Author: George V. Kloss
Reviews.Content: Very nice item for the price, bought it for my wife who is not familiar with digital cameras, easy to use, shipping was very timely, had it in less than 4 days after ordering.  The price was fantastic, could not find a basic digital camera for less money,  Vivitar is good make.  Only thing was I had to buy batteries, and memory card, fairly inexpensive item and easy to use, once you view the CD that comes with and download into computer which takes almost 45 minutes to do so.

Reviews.Title: Pice of Junk
Reviews.Author: minu
Reviews.Content: Very poor construction, lens is very cheap the batteries do not last at all, camera stoped working after 2 days

Reviews.Title: Would be Better if the Software Disc worked
Reviews.Author: Teriane38
Reviews.Content: Not a bad camera for what you pay for it. Little bit cheap feel to it, but the software disc that comes with it to install on your computer doesn't work. When you put it into your computer, you get a corrupted file error. Fortunately HP computers come with photo software of their own. Otherwise the camera would be useless for what it was purchased for.VIVITAR CAMERA DIGITAL 9.1 MP W/1.8 SCN SILVER V9112SILVER

ProductInfo.Features:
9.1 Mega Pixels
4x Digital Zoom
Anti-Shake
Auto Flash
1.8" Preview Screen
ProductInfo.Name: Vivitar Digital Camera
